name: Frog In My Throat Book
descr:
Another book from Dr. Bernard Preston.

The author has penned a compilation of short stories inspired by his experiences in his chiropractic practise in South Africa, as well as from his personal life. The title also tackles several prickly social issues with sensitivity and discernment, for example HI.

White parents with a black daughter. Medical ethic. Tricky inter-doctor relationship. Patient neglect etc., as well as providing practical and constructive technical medial information and psychological insights.
